localize.full_text:

previous.excerpt:
Ark Invest plans to add a “Space Exploration ETF” under the ticker ARKX,
according to a securities filing on Wednesday.

The Space Exploration ETF would focus on companies that are “leading, enabling,
or benefitting from technologically enabled products and/or services that occur
beyond the surface…
previous.title: ARKX space exploration ETF incoming

localize.title: ARKX太空探索ETF来袭
localize.the_new_excerpt:
方舟投资计划增加一只 "太空探索ETF"，股票代码为ARKX。
根据周三的一份证券文件。

太空探索ETF将重点关注那些 "引领、扶持 "的公司。
或受益于技术功能产品和/或服务的发生。
表面上

localize.title: ARKX太空探索ETF來襲
localize.the_new_excerpt:
方舟投資計劃增加一隻 "太空探索ETF"，股票代碼爲ARKX。
根據週三的一份證券文件。

太空探索ETF將重點關注那些 "引領、扶持 "的公司。
或受益於技術功能產品和/或服務的發生。
表面上
